title: @Riot: Any reason Garen's Spin doesn't scale past lvl 16 in URF mode?
body: The ability description says that the ability gains an extra tick of damage every 3 levels, so it's somewhat odd to me that Garen can't go above 10 ticks of damage despite being able to reach lvl 30 in URF mode. This is made particularly perplexing by the fact that Gangplanks Barrel tick rate indeed goes down beyond lvl 18, namely at lvls 19 and 25.

Plz make Garen harder to play for what he does ;/

Garen is literally the easiest champion in the game. That's pretty essential to his character. What you're suggesting is like asking a Rioter to take away Azir's sand soldiers, or make Caitlyn's auto range shorter, or make Teemo's shrooms visible. It goes against what the champ is supposed to _be_.

Unless by "what he does," you mean his Villain passive. Which, again, to take away that would be to take away part of his character, as well as his intended gameplay purpose. He's the game's only true anti-carry. Which makes sense thematically because he would want to seek JUSTICE against people killing his friends, right?

Furthermore, what would making him harder to play even accomplish? Is it because you think it's better to be killed by a player who has to press more buttons? Why is that? I mean at least when playing against a Garen, _you_ are the one with the outplay potential. As opposed to playing against, say, Riven or Zed, who have all the control and can only be punished when they make a mistake.
